summary: 5 profile settings for FXAA Post Processing Injector to suit different people.
descriptionHtml:
[color=orange]:: Information ::[/color]
Here are the profile settings for FXAA Post Processing Injector created by some_dude.
You will [b][u]need[/b][/u]  FXAA Post Processing Injector to run these settings.
I am going to provide 5 profiles to suit different people.
Go to the Images tab to see the effects.

[color=DarkCyan]Profile 1[/color]: High Definition + Mid-Saturation
Pros and Cons: out-door is good and in-door is fair
Suit people who: like hunting outside door, people who hate the cold-feeling of Skyrim

[color=DarkCyan]Profile 2[/color]: High Definition + Vanilla-Saturation
Pros and Cons: seems better than vanilla Skyrim ( all-round )
Suit people who: like to keep the cold-feeling of Skyrim but seeking for better looking

[color=DarkCyan]Profile 3[/color]: Fairy tales-like (Hi-Saturation)
Pros and Cons: the world is much more vivid now; the world looks less real
Suit people who: like greasy-feeling

[color=DarkCyan]Profile 4[/color]: Photo effect (Blackened corners +Technicolor + Mid-sharpening + Lo-Saturation)
Pros and Cons: Blackened corners are both pros and cons for different users
Suit people who: like taking screenshots

[color=DarkCyan]Profile 5[/color]: Just subtle (Lo-sharpening + Lo-Saturation)
Pros and Cons: The effect is REALLY subtle
Suit people who: hate heavily MODDED graphic

[color=red]:: v1.0 ::[/color] [color=grey](Based on FXAA PPI v1.2)[/color]
First Release
[color=red]:: v1.1 ::[/color] [color=grey](Based on FXAA PPI v1.2)[/color]
Since the sharpening effect of Profile 1 and 2 were overdone, it has been decreased to some extent.
Profile 1: Better sharpening method; less jaggy menu words; less bright; better indoor experience
Profile 2: Better sharpening method; less jaggy menu words; less sharpened for more natural 
Profile 3: Less greasy; no more greenish at day-time
Mirror site of V1.1 photos preview added.
[color=red]:: v1.2 ::[/color] [color=grey](Based on FXAA PPI v1.3)[/color]
Add support to FXAA PPI v1.3
Add Profile 5
Profiles 1-4: Fine-tuning

[color=orange]:: Installation ::[/color]
1. Download FXAA Post Process Injector here (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=131#)
2. Install any one of the preset from the original MOD
3. Choose your favourite profile
4. Replace the original injFX_Settings.h with the corresponding injFX_Settings.h
5. Happy gaming

[color=orange]:: Recommended MOD List::[/color]
Enhanced Night Skyrim (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=85)

[color=orange]:: Note ::[/color]
1. The current profile settings are all based on FXAA Post Process Injector v1.3 and may be supported for the ongoing versions.
2. Profile may be added as requested.

[color=orange]:: Credits ::[/color]
some_dude - FXAA Post Process Injector
author: lth886 - For the profiles
